about_the_game:
The Artbook DLC for Blood Midnight Blossom is a collection of illustrations, concept art and other materials. Artbook contains about 30 pages of interesting information. Here you can find both character images and various gameplay and interface elements.

In addition, the DLC includes interviews with the developers where they share their ideas and inspiration. This makes the Artbook not just a collection of pictures, but a valuable source of information about the game's creation.

For players, this DLC is an opportunity to delve deeper into Blood Midnight Blossom world and learn more about its history and characters.

Features

  • Collection of illustrations from the game
  • Sketches
  • Interesting facts about the development
  • Endless love from the authors

The artbook is a PDF file. You can find it inside your Steam game folder. For example:
C:\Program Files\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Blood Midnight Blossom
